segments.text: Happy Birthday , this is for you , Brian .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm so happy you remember , please come in and enjoy the party . Everyone's here , I'm sure you have a good time .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Brian , may I have a pleasure to have a dance with you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , you are always popular with everyone . and you look very pretty today .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thanks , that's very kind of you to say . I hope my necklace goes with my dress , and they both make me look good I feel .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You look great , you are absolutely glowing .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thanks , this is a fine party . We should have a drink together to celebrate your birthday
segments.speaker: S1
